imagination.question: Do you think you have a good Imagination

options.label: I can easily come up with new ideas and creative solutions
I am creative but I always need a little bit of help from someone
I don't think I'm very good at imagination

center-of-attraction.question: Be honest, do you like to be the center of attraction?

options.label: I find it good, everyone knows you and you make new friends and connect with new people
I enjoy socializing and being part of groups, but I don't necessary want to be the main focus
I prefer a smaller group and not to have people's attention

work-in-advance.question: Do you work in advance so you can have free time later?

options.label: I only work when its needed and on time
I like to work in advanced so I can enjoy later
I hardly get my work done by the deadline

needs-before-partner.question: Do you feel like you put your needs before your partner or friend

options.label: I value my well-being and can't compromise with it
I believe in compromises and adjustments to make sure my partner feels happy and fulfilled
I feel there should be a balance to fulfill everyone's needs
